desc: Get your concealed carry permit in Virginia in 3 easy steps. It takes less than an hour, and you never know when you're going to need it.

layout.text: A well armed Virginia is a safe Virginia. Our goal is to simplify the process of getting your concealed carry permit in Virginia. It can be done online, and costs less than $80 in total. Getting your concealed carry permit is easy and takes less than an hour.
